t: Contact a Third-Party Seller - Amazon Customer Service
s: Third-party sellers can be contacted in two ways: Before ordering via the product detail page and after ordering via Your Orders. t: Amazon Transparency: Counterfeit and brand protection
s: Transparency protects your brand and customers from counterfeits by ensuring that every unit shipped is authentic. Learn more about Amazon Transparency.

t: How can I contact the Amazon brand team?
s: Scroll all the way to the bottom and the last section is "Getting Help." In that section there is a link to contact the Amazon Brand Registry team regarding enrollment and a link to the Brand Registry Support team if you are already enrolled.

t: Identifying a scam - Amazon Customer Service
s: Impersonation scams occur when a scammer pretends to be a trustworthy organization or person in order to steal your money or personal information. Impersonation scams are perpetrated in a wide variety of ways - by phone, email, text, or even by messaging you on social media.

t: The Buyer-Seller Messaging Service - Amazon Customer Service
s: The Amazon Buyer-Seller Messaging Service simplifies and protects communication with third-party sellers.
